attributes.action: prevent the loss of 3days payment when an applicant has to stop JSA to claim IB if they become unwell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not believe that anyone should be penalised for being ill. If someone goes from JSA TO incapacity benefit they lose 3 days money immediately as if it is a new claim. It is not reasonable to stop money going to a person who is unfortunate enough to become too sick to work.
